review_blob:
Tall boy on 4/16/16. Pours a mostly clear light amber with a fluffy white head. Pungent nose of lemon, citrus, fruit snacks. Taste is the same. Sweet, citrus, lemon, fruity, maybe some bread. Tasty 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tall boy on 4/16/16. Pours a nice clear copper with a fluffy white head. Nose is sweet citrus, grapefruit, blood orange. Taste is a bit too sweet, nice blood orange coming through but has a metallic, almost malt liquor taste. Acrid. Eh

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tap on 4/13/16. Pours crystal clear copper. Nose is crystal and some citrus. Bread. Taste is light, floral, citrus, biscuits. Fair I suppose 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tap on 4/13/16. Smells like malt liquor. Hard. Crystal clear amber. Don't like the nose at all. Sweet, malt liquor, some fruit, bitter. Not feeling it.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

On tap at the source 4/11/16. Pours like a smoothie of bile and spinach. Looks awful. Can't see through it even a little. Cloudy gone way too far and I like cloudy. Smells like green hops, citrus. Taste is green, ripe mango, tropical fruit, a bit of burn (probably because this is a glass full of yeast), green. It's not bad but what the fuck.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bomber on 4/9/16. Pours jet black with minimal head. Nose is smoky chocolate, maple, dark sugar, bacon. Breakfast. Taste is similar. Chocolate, bacon, smoke, cocoa, meat, maple. Pretty damn tasty. Sweet, savory. Wasn't expecting it to be this good. A little thin.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

2011 bomber on 4/9/16. Pours pitch black, absorbing all light. Thin tan head that makes a ring. Nose is sour, wood. Taste is sour and wood. A bit thin. Not much as far as stout notes. Cherry. Yummy. Easy drinking. Subtle dryness. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tap on 4/8/16. Pours slightly hazy light gold with a fluffy loose white head. Nose is faint citrus. Taste is malty, earthy, maltier than it looks. Reminds me of Sierra Nevada or 60 min or some of the older school ipas. Pretty fair

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle on 3/28/16. Pours a slightly hazy tangerine with a loose white head. Nose is fruits (passion, I suppose), faint wheat. Taste is nicely fruity upfront, sweet, tart, tasty. Not much for hop presence. I like it a lot for a fruit beer ---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle on 3/28/16. Pours a slightly hazy tangerine with a loose white head. Nose is fruits (passion, I suppose), faint wheat. Taste is nicely fruity upfront, sweet, tart, tasty. Not much for hop presence. I like it a lot for a fruit beer but for an ipa it's not hoppy enough.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Growler on 3/25/16. Pours a super hazy grapefruit juice. Love the look. Nose citrus, bright. Taste is the same. Grapefruit, lemon, fruity, juicy. Good 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

On tap on 3/17/16. Pours jet black with a light tan head. No light coming through. Nose is straight coffee, burnt sugar. Like it. Taste is the same. Coffee, cream, sweet, chocolate, roasty, and oddly refreshing? Maybe a tad thin but delicious 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Growler on 3/12/16. Pours a hazy juice. Light honey in color. Nose is citrus and weed. Taste is weed and tropical fruits, melon. Creamy. Dry. Dank. Good

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Bottle on 1/27/16. Pours a hazy dark tangerine. Lasting white head. Nose is grass and dirt. Taste is the same plus fruit snacks. Some booze, mostly fruit snacks, earth. Cat piss. #1 was far better.
Can on 3/11/16. Pours a hazy tangerine. Nose is tropical fruity hops, fruit snacks. Taste is sweet and fruit snacks. Mild citrus, oranges mostly, pine Bread. Good.

Tap on 3/10/16. Pours jet black with a super this ring of tan head that actually sticks around. Nose is ash and booze, dark fruit. Taste is sweet dark fruits, cigs, booze, chocolate, booze, licorice and vodka. Tasty 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

On tap at brewery 3/3. Pours a hazy juicy clementine. Thin white head. Nose is citrus hops, fruit, pineapple, grapefruit. Taste is the same. Fruity, crisp, juicy, pineapple, grapefruit, lasting bitterness, grapefruit pith. Yummy. Great NE ipa

Tap on 2/19/16. Pours clear gold with a fluffy white head. Nose is faint hops. Taste is sweet, orange, apples, yeast. Not really a fan

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tap on 2/6/16. Pours a slightly hazy bright straw. Thin white head. Nose is pungent grass, like really fresh. Wow. Grass, citrus. Taste is fresh hops, grassy, bitter hops, earth, grapefruit rind. Yummy

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

On tap 2/6/16. Pours a slightly hazy light straw. Looks like white grape juice. Nose is funky apples, pepper. Taste is funky, earth, tart, pepper, salt, grass, lemon grass, apples, vinegar. Lots going on. Really good

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tap on 2/6/16. Pours a super cloudy straw as TH ipas do. Nose is citrus, grass, grapefruit. Taste is the same. Juice and grass. Some sweetness. Yummy!

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle on 2/5/16. Pours a clear light copper. Smells of soap and fruit. Taste is soap, kiwi, melon. Good.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Bottle on 2/5/16. Pours jet black with a thin light tan head. Nose roasty, vanilla, coconut. Taste is the same. Coconut, chocolate, vanilla, burnt. Tasty.
beer_name: Flying Dog Brewhouse Rarities: Tropical Stout

review_blob: Bottle on 2/5/16/ Pours a slightly hazy tangerine. Thin white head. Looks like itll lace. Nose orange, citrus fruit, candy. Taste is the same. Fruit, candy, little bit of gummy bears, booze. Pretty good

Bottle on 2/5/16. Pours a clear tangerine with a big white head. Nose is a blast of pineapple as soon as the bottle is cracked. From the glass its a bit more subtle, pineapple, citrus hops, fruit. Taste is the same. Fruit, canned pineapple, grapefruit, pineapple. Yummy but not blown away by the pineapple. But maybe thats a good thing. Well incorpoarted??

Tap on 2/4/16. Pours a clear gold with a fluffy white head. Nose is citrus fruits, soap, mellon, kiwi. Taste is not at all what I was expecting. So much mellon, melon rind, sweet, green plants, more mellon, grass. wow. Yummy and different. Cool beer!
UPDATED: FEB 11, 2016

Bottle on 1/27/16. Pours a hazy dark tangerine. Lasting white head. Nose is grass and dirt. Taste is the same plus fruit snacks. Some booze, mostly fruit snacks, earth. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bomber on 1/22/16 for snow day. Pours copper with a lacy head. Nose is citrus hops, sweet fruit, stone fruit. Taste is the same plus sweet booze. Big old ipa and you can tell. Nice

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
beer_name: Lagunitas One Hitter Series: Bitter Oats

review_blob: Can on 1/23/14 for the snowstorm. Pours a surprisingly dark copper/red. Little head. Nose is fruity hops. Taste is soap, fruit, biscuits, caramel, grapefruit. Nice overal.

Bottle on 1/23/14 for the snow day. Pours a light copper/apricot. Nose of tangerine and hops. Taste is the same with a surprising amount of breadlines. Bitter, fruit, sweet, biscuity. Pretty good 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Can on 1/22/16. Pours a slightly hazy apricot with a fluffy and lasting white head. Nose is tropical fruit. Taste is the same. Fruit and biscuits. Good

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

On tap 1/22/16. Pours jet black with a fluffy tan head. Nose is sweet chocolate, caramel. Taste chocolate, sweet, burnt, dark fruit, ash, dark chocolate, light soy sauce, maple. Not too much maple which I suppose is good. Sort of thin. Decent!

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle on 1/8/16. Pours a crystal golden/straw. Apple juice. Nose is faint hops. Taste is slight tropical, aluminum, I suppose it's a fine drinker

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Can on 1/8/16. Pours a slightly hazy light peach with a frothy white head. Nose is citrus hops, floral. Taste is the same. Nicely bitter, grass, pine, yummy

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tap on 12/31/15. Pours straight grapefruit juice with a fluffy white head. Nose is faint citrus and melon. Taste is the same plus fruit snacks. Some oatiness perhaps, melon, sawdust, more fruit snack. Yummy but not great

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tap on 12/31/15. Pours a clear tangerine. Frothy white head. Nose is big and citrusy. Taste is the same. Big citrus, no malt, all hops. I'm with it 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
beer_name: Neshaminy Creek A Good Problem To Have

review_blob:
On tap 12/28/15. Pours a cloudy crispy light amber. Super thin white head. Nose is green coffee. Taste is the same plus some hoppy citrus. Shouldn't be considered under the pale ale category but a good beer

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tap on 12/28/15. Pours a super clear crisp light copper. Thin and lacy white head. Nose is hoppy and juicy. Taste is piney, citrusy, grapefruit, pepper. Yummy

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
beer_name: Lawsons Finest Sip of Sunshine IPA

review_blob:
Tap on 12/28/15. Pours juicy grapefruit juice. Thin white head. Nose is awesome. Weed, citrus, must, grapefruit, grass, dank as shit. Taste is the same. Dry, citrus, white wine, crisp, yummy. Awesome single ipa

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
beer_name: Hill Farmstead Nelson Sauvin Single Hop Pale Ale

review_blob: Bomber on 12/27/15. Name is Currant Trend so obviously a currant fruit beer but no other info available. Pours a very cloudy reddish brown. Light comes through just around the edges. Thin off white head that dissipates to a ring. Nose is bourbony, butter, caramel, sweet. Smells great. Taste is tart, cherry pie filling, bourbon, butter, but a bit watery/thin at the end. Not my normal style but I think this tastes pretty nice. No word on the abv but I imagine around 4.5%.
Bomber on 12/25/15. Pours a light clear amber/straw. Frothy white head. Nose is crisp apple, fruit, citrus. Taste is fruity and bright. citrus, lemon, juice, tropical fruit, mango, yummy. Drink it
beer_name: Foley Brothers Pieces of Eight Imperial India Pale Ale

review_blob:
Can on 12/24/15. Pours a clear light amber with a thin white head. Nose is faint hops. Good. Well balanced, citrus, bread, pretty good. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bomber on 12/24/15. Pours a clear amber with a frothy white head. Nose is fairly faint. Taste is boozy, orange juice, candied orange peel, malty. Boozy beyond its alcohol. Not super impressed but it's good I guess. No real nose

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
beer_name: Clown Shoes Vic Secret Space Cake

review_blob:
Bottle on 12/22/15. Pours dark brown with loose tan head. Fragrant. Nose is super sweet, dark fruit, caramel, banana bread without the banana, raisin, booze. Lots going on. Taste is sweet, banana bread, dark fruit, burnt sugar, yummy. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
beer_name: Otter Creek / Lawsons Finest Liquids Double or Nothing

review_blob:
Tap on 12/22/15. Pours a hazy dark straw. Fluffy white head. Nose is citrusy hops, grapefruit, juice. Taste is the same and grass, white pepper. Dry and yummy. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

On tap 12/22/15. Pours a hazy dark straw with a fluffy white head. Nose citrus, melon, tropical, yummy. Taste is the same. Lots of melon, lemon, grass, tropical. Super fluffy. Delicious 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

On tap 12/22/15. Pours a hazy light straw. Looks like grapefruit juice. Very much in the New England style. Nose is juicy citrus, grapefruit, lemon. Taste is great. Big, bright, juicy. Grapefruit, lemon, super citrusy and bitter. Some grass. Awesome New England IPAs. So much juicy grapefruit.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Can on 12/19/15. Pours a slightly hazy light copperish orange. This white head. Nose is citrus and fruit snacks. Taste is the same but oddly with a little bit of cocoa powder. Yummy but not great. Good 6 pack 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle on 12/8/15. Pours a slightly hazy orange copper. Nose is nice, fruit, citrus, heat. Taste is nice, fruity, booze, some caramel sweetness, candied orange. I like it. Good standard dipa

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
